title: (x) "for everyday people" sans - DTL Prokyon {Yves}
content:
hi everybody,

can anyone ID this typeface?

thanks in advance. =)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015142104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typeID_5246.jpg)

 [‹ (x) ItsTheSmallThingsThatMatter / HierarchySucks - Egyptian 505 {Raph}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015142104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29552 "Go to previous forum topic") [Sans caps used by EA Sports, a brand division of EA Games, on their games ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015142104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/29528 "Go to next forum topic")
author: begsini

comments.content:
Looks like Gill as the starting point.

Nick Cooke

it’s close to ITC Johnston.

...so London railway!

thanks, guys.

i have just learned that this is a custom typeface.

Not custom — [DTL Prokyon](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015142104/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/ProkyonRegular.html), available from the [Dutch Type Library](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015142104/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/).
